title: On My Mind
lyrics:
On my mind
On my mind
On my mind baby
Jag-eun byeol-eul seeoga
Puleun bam-eun deobseog

Neodo moleuge neol ewossa



Sinbal kkeun-i hejil ttaejjeum-e nan geol-eum-eul meomchwo

Neolan seom-e wa



Baby you got me up all night

Baby you got me up all night



Nan honjain ge pyeonhaessneunde

Neoleul mannan hue byeonhan ge

Sudo eobs-i manhji

Gojang nassdeon nebi

Gil-eul ilh-eun salm-eseo nal nagaji moshage hadeon jang-aemul-eul kkaessji



Nan geol-eogalyeo hae

Neowa hamkke gal su issneun sigan sog-eulo

Dochaghal ttaejjeum-e naega mid-eojindamyeon

Geuttaeneun meosjjeogge son-eul naemil su issgessji



We going on

Neowa naman-ui gos-e gaja

Baby it’s time to grind my mind



We going on

Saeloun yaegil sijaghaleo gaja

Haega tteugi jeon-e Girl



Ijen geunyang swieodo dwae

Bul-eonaneun geogjeong bul-an ttawin jeonbu naelyeonwa



Mogmaleum-i deo haejyeo himdeul ttaen

Geol-eum-eul meomchwo nae yeop-eulo wa



Baby you got me up all night

Baby you got me up all night



Naneun hangsang usgo issgo

Naneun hangsang kkoch-eul pigo

Naneun hangsang gang-ajiga dwae

Jeongmal igeol balaessdamyeon

Nan daleun gil-eul gagessji

Geulae jal al-adeudgil bala

Nega bukkeuleobji anhge



Ulin salanghajanh-a

Aleumdawojil geoya

Majchumyeon dwae jogeumman nolyeoghaejwo Bae

Sigan-i geum-ilaneun mal-i gyesog saeng-gaghage dwae manh-i

Ulil balg-ge bichuge hae



We going on

Neowa naman-ui gos-e gaja

Baby it’s time to grind my mind



We going on

Saeloun yaegil sijaghaleo gaja

Haega tteugi jeon-e Girl



Neon geudaelo iss-eojwo jigeum moseub geudaelo



Modeun ge byeonhae gado Girl

Nan neoleul nohchiji anh-a



Byeonham-eobsgil bala

Neowa naui sigan-en

Majimag insaneun eobs-eul geoya neon nae yeop-eman iss-eo



So right

Nan mid-eo neol

Jigeum nae nun-ap-ui gos-e

Nice place to play my love



We going on

Neowa naman-ui gos-e gaja

Baby it’s time to grind my mind



We going on

Saeloun yaegil sijaghaleo gaja

Haega tteugi jeon-e Girl



On my mind

On my mind

On my mind baby



On my mind

On my mind

On my mind baby
